title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, it shows an error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
OB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, it shows an error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
EB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, it should successfully create the JAR file without any error messages
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a file and make some changes without saving
2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project
3. Fill in all the required fields (path, destination, name, description, etc.)
4. Press the finish button
